medium: Cloth: cotton, cotton appliqué and embroidery
text: Chikarkarpe robes are made of embellished trade cotton. First they are decorated with appliquéd dyed cotton, and then they are embroidered with intricate, yet open, linear designs. Approaches differed from one region to another based on individual and popular tastes and the availability of materials.
title: Chikarkarpe robe
